Text: If you work in a government position and receive a pension for work not subject to Social Security taxes, your Social Security benefits received as a spouse or widow or widower are reduced by two-thirds of the amount of the pension.
Cause: If you work in a government position and receive a pension for work not subject to Social Security taxes
Effect: your Social Security benefits received as a spouse or widow or widower are reduced by two-thirds of the amount of the pension.
Sentence: <e1>If you work in a government position and receive a pension for work not subject to Social Security taxes</e1>, <e2>your Social Security benefits received as a spouse or widow or widower are reduced by two-thirds of the amount of the pension.</e2>
